properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. S/V CV28 REPORTS CREWMAN REQUIRING
   MEDICAL ASSISTANCE IN 34-48.04S 001-43.90W
   VESSELS ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL ASSISTANCE
   REQUESTED ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO NAVAREA VII,
   PHONE: 272 1787 2408, 272 1787 2445,
   272 1787 2444,
   FAX: 272 1787 2233, 272 1787 2228,
   E-MAIL: HYDROSAN@IAFRICA.COM,
   NAVCOMCEN.CAPE@SANAVY.CO.ZA.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3400/19.
